modes: Auto WB, Daylight, Cloudy, Fluorescent_H, Fluorescent_L, Tungsten, Custom, K

windows: PC with processor better than Intel Pentium4 3.2 GHz / AMD Athlon FX 2.6GHz or higher / Windows XP_SP2 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 250MB or more hard-disk capacity (over 1GB recommended)/ 512MB RAM (over 1GB recommended)/ nVIDIA Geforce 7600GT or above / ATI X1600 series or above/ 1024?768 pixels, 16-bit color display compatible monitor/ (1280?1024 pixels, 32-bit color display recommended)/ USB 2.0/ DirectX 9.0c or above
